comment.author: 29029178@N03
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called Pubs of Australia, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 32642787@N02
comment._content: Re the signage & building behind the Caledonian Hotel, my grandfather (Ormuz Cobb) worked for 'BROOMFIELDS Ltd'  pre and post WW1. If there is anybody out there who has any information on 'Broomfields Ltd', I'd love to hear from you (cobby@iinet.net.au).
